Text: The Man in the High Castle (TV series):  In the series' alternate version of 1962 America, the Axis powers have won World War II and divided the United States into the Greater Nazi Reich and the Japanese Pacific States.

Text: The Man in the High Castle (TV series):  The series follows characters whose destinies intertwine after coming into contact with a series of propaganda films that show a vastly different history from that of their own.
